title: Commandant of Auschwitz
description: Rudolf Hoess, former commandant of Auschwitz, the huge Nazi extermination camp in Poland, gives us here his authentic autobiography. He openly confesses that he personally arranged to have 2,000,000 persons shot or gassed . . . While in prison awaiting his execution, he was ordered to record his memories. He gladly complied . . .
author: Rudolf HÃ¶ss
